content: yo and pull up a loop 3 loops on hook then yo and pull through 2 loops twice b around top = b back post double_crochet around top of st yo insert hook from back to front under two loops of indicated st and to back again under two loops of next stitch yo and pull up a loop 3 loops on hook then yo and pull through 2 loops twice in this way crochet around any popcorn stitches 2tog and 3tog stitches unless otherwise noted b around top video f2tog it is the same as a decrease except that you work around the posts of the stitches rather than into the loops yo insert hook from front to back and to front again around post of next stitch unless otherwise noted yo and pull up a loop 3 loops on hook yo and pull through 2 loops there should now be 2 loops on your hook yo insert hook from front to back and to front again around the post of the next stitch yo and pull up a loop 3 loops on hook yo and pull through 2 loops there should now be 3 loops on your hook yo and pull through all 3 loops f3tog it is the same as a dc3tog except that you work around the posts of the stitches rather than into the loops b2tog it is the same as a decrease except that you work around the posts of the stitches rather than into the loops © tulip bag crochet by svetlana rogatykh 4 f2i front post increases are made by making 2 fpdc around the post of the same stitch usually crochet the second fp over the first but sometimes you need to crochet the second under the first f2i second f under the first f video f3i front post increases are made by making 3 fpdc around the post of the same stitch b2i back post increases are made by making 2 bpdc around the post of the same stitch b2i video ftr front post treble_crochet yo twice insert hook from front to back and to front again around post of indicated stitch yo and pull up a loop 4 loops on hook then yo and pull through 2 loops 3 times btr back post treble_crochet yo twice insert hook from back to front and to back again around post of indicated stitch yo and pull up a loop 4 loops on hook then yo and pull through 2 loops 3 times ftr and f decrease front post treble_crochet and front post double_crochet two together decrease work the first treble_crochet until only 2 loops are on the hook yarn over insert hook from front to back and to front again around post of indicated stitch yarn over pull up a loop yarn over pull through 2 loops 3 loops on hook yarn over pull yarn through 3 loops for a completed decrease f and ftr decrease front post double_crochet and front
